name: CrisisOnMars
description:
Celebrating the release of our new game Rock(s) Rider. CrisisOnMars is now available for free !!!

Crisis on Mars will transport you into the future. You will experience an energy crisis on a remote planet of Mars. Take the initiative and use the space ships to colect lost energy. Do not hesitate and start now so there won't be a power outage in the city any more. "Alice" computer will surely help you...




Features:

- 8 Different Sci-fi Space Ships.
- 24 Missions.
- 8 Special Time Trial Missions.
- Amazing Lighting and Special Effects.
- Dramatic Orchestral Music and Sound Effects.
- Amazing 3D environments enhanced with LightMaps.
- Intuitive Controls for Best Gameplay Experience.



Recommended for All Fans of Sci-fi Games
